title: Discord officially rolls out PlayStation integration, complete with game status support
content:
Monday was already a big day for PlayStation news, as Sony revealed that it’s working to acquire Destiny 2 developer Bungie, but that’s not all. Discord, the popular messaging platform primarily aimed at gaming, is finally rolling out PlayStation account integration.
